name: Cold
description: If Cold is afflicted twice, the Temtem becomes Frozen. Frozen Temtem cannot attack, but they can rest normally. Cold and Frozen also serve to erase the Burned Condition from a Temtem, while Burned erases both Cold and Frozen.

name: Frozen
description: If Cold is afflicted twice, the Temtem becomes Frozen. Frozen Temtem cannot attack, but they can rest normally. Cold and Frozen also serve to erase the Burned Condition from a Temtem, while Burned erases both Cold and Frozen.

name: Asleep
description: Asleep Temtem cannot attack, but if they are damaged, they wake up (the condition is removed). Any damage that is done to the Temtem will remove the Asleep Condition, including damage from other conditions like Burned or Poison. Upon waking, the Temtem will gain the Alerted Condition until the end of the next turn.Mental type Temtem are immune against this condition.

name: Doomed
description: Once the turn counter on the Doomed Temtem hits 0, the Temtem will faint.

name: Seized
description: Seized Temtem lose their equipped gear's effect.

name: Poisoned
description: Poisoned Temtem lose 1/8 of their health every turn. Temtem of the Toxic Type are immune against this condition.

name: Burned
description: Burned Temtem lose 1/16 of health every turn and it reduces both attack and special attack by 30%. Temtem of the Fire Type are immune against this condition. The Burned condition erases Cold and Frozen when applied to a Temtem, while both can similarly erase the Burned from a Temtem.

name: Exhausted
description: The Stamina costs of an Exhausted Temtem increase by 50%.

name: Vigorized
description: The Stamina costs of a Vigorized Temtem decrease by 50%.

name: Immune
description: Immune Temtem are unable to be subject to new status conditions.

name: Regenerated
description: Each turn, the Regenerated Temtem heals 1/10 of their health.

name: Nullified
description: Nullified Temtem have their resistances and weaknesses omitted.

name: Evading
description: An Evading Temtem will not be affected by the next offensive technique used on it.

name: Alerted
description: An Alert Temtem cannot fall asleep. After a Temtem wakes up from having the Sleep Condition, it will gain Alerted until the end of the next turn.

name: Exiled
description: Synergies do not work with Exiled Temtem (currently does not exist in game, subject to change).
